sentence:
We used descriptive statistics to summarize trends by decade and discipline.Results
Our search identified 26,487 citations (Fig 1).
This trend is likely to continue in the 2020s: nearly a third (32.5%) of all published articles (n = 6,454) appeared in the first 2.5 years of the current decade (Fig 2).
The remaining 4.4% (n = 879) appeared in other fields such as arts, music, education, library, and military science (see Fig 3).

While there were no Delphi publications in medical journals in the 1960s and only 16.4% of all Delphi articles published in the 1970s appeared in medical journals, this proportion increased to 39.7% in the 1980s (Fig 4).
